TEXT.English: [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]A baby [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1[COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT] has been born in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Biodome[COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]! Ooh it looks cute![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]Un bébé [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1[COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT] est né dans le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Biodome[COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]! Oh, comme il est mignon![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Polish: [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]Maly [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1[COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT] urodzil sie w [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Biodomie[COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]! O, jaki slodziak![COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Cut lowest player in %d1 turns
TEXT.French: Joueur en dernière position éliminé dans %d1 tours
TEXT.German: Schwächster Spieler wird in %d1 Runden entfernt
TEXT.Spanish: Se eliminará al último jugador en %d1 [NUM1:turno:turnos]

TEXT.English: Difficulty - %s1
TEXT.French: Difficulté - %s1

TEXT.English: High To Low: Get the high score (stage 1/3)
TEXT.French: Premier au Dernier: Atteindre le meilleur score (Etape 1/3)
TEXT.German: Höhen und Tiefen: Erreiche den höchsten Punktestand (Stufe 1 von 3)
TEXT.Italian: Dalle stelle alle stalle: ottieni il punteggio più alto (stage 1/3)
TEXT.Spanish: De arriba a abajo: Alcanza la mejor puntuación (Etapa 1/3)

TEXT.English: High To Low: Get the high score (stage 2/3)
TEXT.French: Premier au Dernier: Atteindre le meilleur score (Etape 2/3)
TEXT.German: Höhen und Tiefen: Erreiche den höchsten Punktestand (Stufe 2 von 3)
TEXT.Italian: Dalle stelle alle stalle: ottieni il punteggio più alto (stage 2/3)
TEXT.Spanish: De arriba a abajo: Alcanza la mejor puntuación (Etapa 2/3)

TEXT.English: High To Low: Conditions met, now win the game! (stage 3/3)
TEXT.French: Premier au Dernier: Objectifs atteints, Maintenant, Il faut Gagner! (Etape 3/3)
TEXT.German: Höhen und Tiefen: Vorgaben erreicht, jetzt gewinne das Spiel! (Stufe 3 von 3)
TEXT.Italian: Dalle stelle alle stalle: obiettivo completato! Ora vinci la partita! (stage 3/3)
TEXT.Spanish: De arriba a abajo: condiciones cumplidas, ¡ahora a ganar la partida! (Etapa 3/3)
TEXT.Polish: Silny - słabszy: Cele osiągnięte, teraz wygraj grę! (etap 3/3)

TEXT.English: %s1_city welcomes the new immigrants with open arms.
TEXT.French: %s1_city accueille les nouveaux immigrants à bras ouverts.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s1 has plundered %d2 [ICON_RESEARCH] from you![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s1 vous a volé %d2 [ICON_RESEARCH]![COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]You have plundered %d2 [ICON_RESEARCH] from %s1![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]Vous avez pillé %d2 [ICON_RESEARCH] à %s1![COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: An inquisition in %s1_city has successfully purged all non-state religions and gold was confiscated from the victims.
TEXT.French: Une inquisition à %s1_city a permis de purger toutes les religions non officielles et l'or des infidèles à été confisqué.
TEXT.German: Eine Inquisition in %s1_city hat alle nicht-staatlichen Religionen erfolgreich eliminiert. Es wurde Gold von den Opfern konfisziert.
TEXT.Italian: Una Inquisizione nella città di %s1_city ha eliminato con successo tutte le religioni diverse da quella di Stato.
TEXT.Spanish: Un Tribunal de la Fé convocado en %s1_city ha eliminado todas las religiones no oficiales. Se ha confiscado algo de oro de las víctimas.
TEXT.Polish: Inkwizytorowi w mieście %s1_city udało się odeprzeć wszystkie niepaństwowe religie i dodatkowo udało się skonfiskować złoto od ofiar.

TEXT.English: An inquisition in %s1_city has failed to purge all non-state religions.
TEXT.French: L'inquisition menée à %s1_city n'a pas permis de purger toutes les religions non officielles.
TEXT.German: Einer Inquisition in %s1_city gelang es nicht, nicht-staatliche Religionen zu eliminieren.
TEXT.Italian: Una Inquisizione nella città di %s1_city ha fallito l'eliminazione delle religioni non di Stato.
TEXT.Spanish: Un Tribunal de la Fé convocado en %s1_city ha fallado al intentar eliminar a los herejes.
TEXT.Polish: Inkwizytorowi w mieście %s1_city nie udało się odeprzeć wszystkich niepaństwowych religii.

TEXT.English: %s2_religion has been purged from %s1_city.
TEXT.French: %s2_religion a été purgée de %s1_city.
TEXT.Italian: %s2_religion è stato sradicato dalla città di %s1_city.
TEXT.Spanish: [NUM2:El:La:Los:Las] %s2_religion [NUM2:ha sido eliminado:ha sido eliminada:han sido eliminados:han sido eliminadas] de %s1_city.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kentucky Derby[COLOR_REVERT] has produced a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Subdued Horse[COLOR_REVERT]!
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Derby du Kentucky[COLOR_REVERT] a produit un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cheval apprivoisé[COLOR_REVERT]!
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Derby del Kentucky[COLOR_REVERT] ha prodotto un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavallo ammaestrato[COLOR_REVERT]!

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Nazca Lines[COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT] have increased![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lignes de Nazca[COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT] se sont développées![COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: You have planted a bamboo grove.
TEXT.French: Vous avez planté une bambouseraie.
TEXT.Spanish: Has plantado un Bosque de bambú.

TEXT.English: You have planted a forest.
TEXT.French: Vous avez planté une forêt.

TEXT.English: You have planted a savanna.
TEXT.French: Vous avez planté une savane.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s1 has plundered %d2 [ICON_ESPIONAGE] from you![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s1 vous a volé %d2 [ICON_ESPIONAGE]![COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]You have plundered %d2 [ICON_ESPIONAGE] from %s1![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]Vous avez pillé %d2 [ICON_ESPIONAGE] à %s1![COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: The stars have favored a unit produced in %s1!
TEXT.French: Les Astres ont favorisé l'unité produite à %s1!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Parece que los astros han favorecido a una unidad entrenada en %s1!

TEXT.English: The stars have favored a newly created unit!
TEXT.French: Les Astres favorisent l'unité nouvellement créé!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Parece que los astros han favorecido a una unidad recién entrenada!

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tsukiji Fish Market [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]found a new source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1[COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marché aux poissons de Tsukiji [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT] donne accès ç une nouvelle source de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1[COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]![COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: %s1 has captured the wonder %s2!
TEXT.French: %s1 a capturé la merveille: %s2!

TEXT.English: You have captured the wonder %s2!
TEXT.French: Vous avez capturé la merveille: %s2!

TEXT.English: %s1 has destroyed the wonder %s2!
TEXT.French: %s1 a détruit la merveille: %s2!

TEXT.English: You have destroyed the wonder %s2!
TEXT.French: Vous avez détruit la merveille: %s2!

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Zizkov Television Tower has jammed our radio signals![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tour de Télévision de Zizkov a brouillé nos signaux radio![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Polish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Wieza Telewizyjna Zizkov zaklócila nasze sygnaly radiowe![COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Zizkov Television Tower[COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT] has jammed the radio signals of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1[COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]![COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tour de Télévision de Zizkov[COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT] a brouillé les signaux radio de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1[COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]![COLOR_REVERT]
